author: Alaa Elassar, CNN
title: Breakdown: Here's where all 50 states stand on reopening
description: More than 90% of the US population is currently under a stay-at-home or shelter-in-place order as the coronavirus pandemic continues to upend life as we know it. But worries for the economy -- and people's mental health -- are begging the question: When will …
